inclusion.criterion: Inspiratory Muscle Training Program with Threshold IMT device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The Mini-mental test score is above 23
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal neurodevelopmental therapy (NGT) 5 days a week
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total duration of treatment will take 6 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Group will have neurodevelopmental treatment program (BOBATH treatment approach) and diaphragmatic breathing exercises
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Group will have neurodevelopmental treatment program (BOBATH treatment approach) and respiratory muscle training with the THRESHOLD IMT device
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other neurological or orthopedic problems that affect functionality and balance, other than stroke
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: High blood pressure, heart disease which may prevent rehabilitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Have undergone thoracic or cardiovascular surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Agnosia or a person with visual impairment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The medical condition is not stable
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and will be treated with Bisphosphonate. The patient is a 60 year old man complaining of frequent headaches, generalized bone pain and difficulty chewing that started 6 years ago and is worsening.
